definitions.definition: Obliged, when called upon, to answer (for one’s deeds); answerable .
examples: Everyone is accountable to God for their conduct.
You will be held accountable for your misdemeanors.

definitions.definition: Obliged to keep accurate records (of property or funds ).
Liable to be called on to render an account.
Capable of being accounted for; explicable ; explainable .

main_definition: Obliged, when called upon, to answer (for one’s deeds); answerable .
secondary_definitions: Obliged to keep accurate records (of property or funds ).
Liable to be called on to render an account.
( rare ) Capable of being accounted for; explicable ; explainable .
